body:
Hello everyone, Acceqted here. I have been trying to upgrade my computer piece by piece. I'm asking for a keyboard for Christmas. My gaming mouse is shipping, and I'm saving up for a tower. It has now came down to a monitor. If anyone has suggestions that you think would work. (Hopefully off of amazon) that would be very much appreciated.

Budget; 250$ CAN

Thank you in advance!!

Acceqted <3

title: Gaming Monitor | Help!

replies.body: I live in Canada, wtf are you thinking, you cant fucking buy a monitor for 100$, for a nice 1ms 60hz 1080p, hdmi, 200$ atleast, please.
replies.body_tagged: I live in Canada, wtf are you thinking, you cant fucking buy a monitor for 100$, for a nice 1ms 60hz 1080p, hdmi, 200$ atleast, please.

replies.body:
100$ for a gaming monitor, or even a normal monitor, is unheard of. Like Capt said 200$ AT LEAST.

This is basically the best you're going to get, at least to my knowledge.

http://www.ncix.com/detail/benq-gl2460hm-24in-led-1920x1080-1b-95040-1210.htm?affiliateid=7474144
